name: flowspec
description: Comprehensive Spec-Driven Development toolkit with multi-language support, specialized agents, and integrated security/observability tools
author: Jason Poley

commands.name: flow:specify
commands.description: Create/update feature specs using PM planner agent (manages /speckit.tasks)

commands.name: flow:research
commands.description: Execute research and business validation workflow

commands.name: flow:implement
commands.description: Execute implementation (frontend + backend engineers + code review)

commands.name: flow:validate
commands.description: Execute QA and validation (QA + security + docs + release)

commands.name: flow:operate
commands.description: Execute operations (SRE for CI/CD + K8s + DevSecOps + observability)

agents.name: sre-agent
agents.description: Expert SRE for CI/CD (GitHub Actions), Kubernetes, DevSecOps, observability, and operational excellence

agents.name: product-requirements-manager-enhanced
agents.description: Product requirements manager for comprehensive PRD creation and task management

agents.name: software-architect-enhanced
agents.description: Software architect for system design, architecture decisions, and technical planning

agents.name: platform-engineer-enhanced
agents.description: Platform engineer for infrastructure, tooling, and developer experience

agents.name: researcher
agents.description: Research specialist for technical investigation and analysis

agents.name: business-validator
agents.description: Business validator for market research and business case validation

agents.name: frontend-engineer
agents.description: Frontend engineer for UI/UX implementation and client-side development

agents.name: backend-engineer
agents.description: Backend engineer for API, data, and server-side development

agents.name: ai-ml-engineer
agents.description: AI/ML engineer for machine learning and AI model development

agents.name: frontend-code-reviewer
agents.description: Frontend code reviewer for quality assurance and best practices

agents.name: backend-code-reviewer
agents.description: Backend code reviewer for quality assurance and best practices

agents.name: quality-guardian
agents.description: Quality guardian for comprehensive testing and quality assurance

agents.name: secure-by-design-engineer
agents.description: Security engineer for security-first design and implementation

agents.name: tech-writer
agents.description: Technical writer for documentation and knowledge management

agents.name: release-manager
agents.description: Release manager for deployment coordination and release orchestration

pre-commit.command: ruff check . && ruff format . && pytest tests/
pre-commit.description: Run linting, formatting, and tests before commit

notes.languageSupport: Includes language-specific agent personas for C, C++, C#, Go, Java, Kotlin, Python, Rust, TypeScript/JavaScript, and Mobile (Dart/Flutter)
notes.mcpServers: Pre-configured with 7 MCP servers: GitHub, Serena, Playwright, Trivy, Semgrep, shadcn-ui, Chrome DevTools
notes.dualDistribution: Also available as Specify CLI (pip install flowspec-cli) for multi-agent support (Copilot, Gemini, Cursor, etc.)
